EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Devoxx Belgium 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at Devoxx US 2017 <[[https://devoxx.us/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]>. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]>, a great public cloud for running Spring Framework (and .NET) on Cloud Foundry! Don’t forget to download your free copy of the O’Reilly eBook, Migrating to Cloud-Native Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]>, a useful IT management primer on why cloud-native matters.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Cloud-Native Java <[[http://cfp.devoxx.us/2017/talk/XIA-0432/Cloud_Native_Java]]> with Josh Long - Reactive Spring <[[http://cfp.devoxx.us/2017/talk/JXY-6860/Reactive_Spring]]> with Josh Long and Mark Heckler - Navigate All the Knowledge <[[http://cfp.devoxx.us/2017/talk/WHT-4635/Navigate_All_the_Knowledge]]> with James Weaver - Next Level Spring Boot Tooling <[[http://cfp.devoxx.us/2017/talk/FVI-4576/Next_Level_Spring_Boot_Tooling]]> with Martin Lippert - A Sneak Peek into the Spring Boot Language Server <[[https://www.eclipseconverge.org/na2017/session/sneak-peek-spring-boot-language-server]]> with Martin Lippert
Hungry for the latest in Spring, Pivotal and Cloud Foundry?
- Spring Blog: Notes on Reactive Programming Part I: The Reactive Landscape <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/06/07/notes-on-reactive-programming-part-i-the-reactive-landscape?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]> - Spring Blog: Reactive Programming with Spring 5.0 M1 <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/07/28/reactive-programming-with-spring-5-0-m1?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]> - Spring Blog: New in Spring Framework 5.0: Functional Web Framework <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/22/new-in-spring-5-functional-web-framework?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]> - Spring Blog: Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.0 GA release <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/11/23/spring-cloud-data-flow-1-1-ga-released?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]> - Pivotal blog: Now Available - Spring Cloud Services for Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/now-available-spring-cloud-services-for-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: Cloud-Native Java <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/12/springone-platform-2016-replay-cloud-native-java?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: The Journey From Monolith to Microservices: A Guided Adventure <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tx5h3hdvjfw]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: 12 Factor, or Cloud-Native Apps: What EXACTLY Does that Mean for Spring Developers? <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/12/springone-platform-2016-replay-12-factor-or-cloud-native-apps-what-exactly-does-that-mean-for-spring-developers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]>
Stay in touch with our team and join the Spring conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]>, podcasts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/springcentral]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devoxx-san-jose-q117]]>!
Thank you, The Pivotal and Spring Team
